```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(tidyverse)
library(viridis)
library(plotly)
library(here)
library(shiny)
library(shinyjs)
```

```{r datasets, include = FALSE}
weather.df <- read_csv(here("data/weather/weather_data.csv"))
AQI.df <- read_csv(here("data/air_quality/air_zip_uhf.csv"))
SDI.df <- read_csv(here("data/SDI_data/SD_Zip_ufh.csv"))
```


Column {.sidebar}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

```{r weather inputs}
element_vec = weather.df %>% pull(element) %>% unique()

selectInput(
  inputId = "element_choice",
  label = h3("Select element"),
  choices = element_vec,
  selected = "PRCP"
)

borough_vec = weather.df %>% pull(location) %>% unique()

radioButtons(
  inputId = "borough_choice",
  label = h3("Select a Borough"),
  choices = borough_vec,
  selected = "Brooklyn"
)

month_vec = weather.df %>% pull(month_name) %>% unique()

#selectInput(  inputId = "month",  label = h3("Select a month"),  choices = month_vec,  select = "January")
```

```{r AQI inputs}
name_particle_vec = AQI.df %>% pull(name) %>% unique()

selectInput(
  inputId = "particle_choice",
  label = h3("Select Particle"),
  choices = name_particle_vec,
  selected = "Fine particles (PM 2.5)"
)

neighborhood_vec = AQI.df %>% pull(geo_place_name) %>% unique()

radioButtons(
  inputId = "Neighborhood_choice",
  label = h3("Select a neighborhood"),
  choices = neighborhood_vec,
  selected = "Washington Heights"
)

```

```{r SDI inputs}
uhf34_neighborhood_vec = SDI.df %>% pull(uhf34_neighborhood) %>% unique()

selectInput(
  inputId = "neighborhood_choice",
  label = h3("Select Neighborhood"),
  choices = uhf34_neighborhood_vec,
  selected = "Washington Heights"
)
```

Column {data-width=350}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart B

```{r}
renderPlotly({
  weather.df %>%
  filter(
    element == input$element_choice,
    location == input$borough_choice,
  ) %>%
  plot_ly(x = ~month, y = ~data_value, type = "bar", mode = "markers", color = ~location)
})
```

x = reorder(geo_place_name, -data_value), y = data_value)

### Chart C

```{r}
renderPlotly({
  SDI.df %>%
  filter(
    uhf34_neighborhood == input$neighborhood_choice,
  ) %>%
  plot_ly(x = ~uhf34_neighborhood, y = ~sdi_score, type = "bar", mode = "markers")
})
```
